column4: I requested a double bed and i had two single beds put together which is not a double bed!! So i paid for a double room for nothing!!
The room is not clean, the hotel smells bad

column3: Internet very bad, no bar, no lobby, no room service, breakfast in a basement

column4: Ac set to 25 degrees far too hot. Windows did open a little but drunk youths partied all night in the plaza outside. Choice between heat and noise.  Either way little sleep.

column3: Location. This place is right out of Brussels Centraal and two steps from Grand Place.
